data.label: Delay/Rate Presets
data.description: Select from a variety of different presets for the autoshift

data.label: Autoshift Delay
data.description: (DAS) The amount of time in milliseconds before a piece will automatically shift

data.label: Autoshift Rate
data.description: (ARR) The amount of time in milliseconds in between each automatic shift

data.label: Autoshift Preload
data.description: Automatically fully charge the autoshift when a shift key is pressed during entry delay
